raw_comment: These results are taken from a survey done in the midst of the Covid-19 pandemic to measure how different generations are coping with the global situation. Scientists who wish to analyze optimism in young people and anyone else who may be interested in this topic. Using this data we can conclude optimism can vary based on different events that an individual has experienced in their lifetime, specifically if living standards have increased significantly. This data was collected to analyze how individuals from different backgrounds are coping with the Covid-19 pandemic and identify potential causes for individuals feeling concerned for the future. This data is presented as a two-variable scatter chart with many different data points from a diverse selection of locations and economic backgrounds.
ace_sentences: The results come from a survey.
The survey was done during the Covid-19 pandemic.
The purpose of the survey was to measure how different generations cope with the global situation.
Some scientists want to analyze optimism in young people.
Some other people are interested in this topic.
This data can support a conclusion.
Optimism can vary because of events that a person experienced in the lifetime of the person.
Optimism can vary if the living standards of the person increased significantly.
The data was collected to analyze how individuals from different backgrounds cope with the Covid-19 pandemic.
The data was collected to identify potential causes of concern about the future.
The data is presented as a two-variable scatter chart.
The scatter chart contains many data points.
The data points come from a diverse selection of locations.
The data points come from a diverse selection of economic backgrounds.
